component.name: Assembler
component.definition: Instantiates and assembles a configured, runnable, instance of the container system and all sub-components. Vendors needing extreme control over the construction of the container system can get it by implementing this class. Doing this comes with large amounts of resposibility and complexity and should not be done without consulting the OpenEJB team first.
component.responsibility: Instantiate and initialize all Container implementations
